body_html:
In addition, support for 2D/3D sliding window CNNs (specifically, dense training using output patches) would be appreciated.

For references on 2D/3D sliding window CNNs, see:

  • http://znn-release.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  • http://people.idsia.ch/~juergen/nips2012.pdf
body_text:
In addition, support for 2D/3D sliding window CNNs (specifically, dense training using output patches) would be appreciated.
For references on 2D/3D sliding window CNNs, see:

http://znn-release.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
http://people.idsia.ch/~juergen/nips2012.pdf
body:
In addition, support for 2D/3D sliding window CNNs (specifically, dense training using output patches) would be appreciated.

For references on 2D/3D sliding window CNNs, see:
- http://znn-release.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
- http://people.idsia.ch/~juergen/nips2012.pdf
